synopsis.text: In the present day, a cloaked assassin, plagued by a feeble physical state, grapples with an unusual method of execution. Instead of wielding conventional weapons, he harnesses the power of psychokinesis to eliminate his targets. To determine their fate, he engages in personal meetings, sparking a series of intense and dramatic conversations. Delve into the enigmatic life of this unconventional assassin, as he navigates the complexities of his missions while grappling with his own physical vulnerabilities.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
